The Catcher is a baseball team's last line of defense against the offense. The instructions in this video are straight forward and dead on.
Nothing is sugar coated in DRILLS & TECHNIQUES FOR CATCHERS.
If your catcher wants to improve, pick up this DVD and make sure he is diligent about practicing the drills. My son is a 12 year old catcher and has reviewed this over and over and we have seen marked improvement. Make no mistake, the catching position in baseball is not for everyone. But if your catcher is serious about the playing this challenging position, this is the best $25.00 you will ever spend.
HIGHLY ENDORSED!

This is one of the best put together instructional videos I have seen. Catchers in baseball are a rare breed. This video captures the type of players catchers need to be. The drills and techniques are most relevant to youth baseball catchers as well as the most competitive school catcher. The drills challenge the catchers and many help conquer any fear of the baseball a youth catcher may have. A lot of the advanced drills are dual purpose drills that not only help skill wise but are beneficial for conditioning. Any Johnny Bench or Yogi Berra wannabes should view this product.
FOUL TIPS WILL STAY IN THE GLOVE AFTER VIEWING THIS PROGRAM!
VERY HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

What I like about DRILLS & TECHNIQUES FOR CATCHERS is the way it flows
combining fundamentals, tips and drills.  An excellent program for
catchers new to the position as well as pertinent tips for those who have played catcher for years.
The drills range from very basic to more complex. Highly recommended for catching prospects 8-16.

Typically in Little League baseball catchers are somehow drawn to that position. And from what I've seen those that are catchers at 12 who continue to play, most remain there. DRILLS & TECHNIQUES FOR CATCHERS will give young players an excellent introduction to the toughest position to master on the baseball playing field. Once the basics are addressed (ie. stance, positioning etc), the drills reinforce it all. Interestingly, youth players will enjoy this but those players continuing at the position numbered "2" can refer to this program through their school baseball days. This DVD is as good as holding on to a tipped third strike! OUTSTANDING! For the most part I found DRILLS & TECHNIQUES FOR CATCHERS an excellent resource tool for players who want to improve at the catching position. The real beauty of this program is the way it is structured. The content is generally for the youth player but it becomes an excellent reference for catchers as they get older. For instance, the basics are covered ie positioning, stance, defending the steal and more. As the player gets older, there is an excellent section on framing and the importance of trying to "influence" an umpire. This is highly recommended for players 9-16 years old.
